Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class SignatureVerificationContext

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.BenchmarkingContext
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureBaseContext
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureVerificationContext
public class SignatureVerificationContext extends SignatureBaseContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of signature verification operations. It extends BenchmarkingContext to provide functionality specific to signature verification, such as exporting verification decisions to the generalised results view.

    • showExportVerificationResultsButton

      public boolean showExportVerificationResultsButton()
      Determines whether the export verification results button should be shown.
      Overrides:
      showExportVerificationResultsButton in class BenchmarkingContext
      Returns:
      true, indicating that the button should always be shown in this context.

    • exportVerificationResults

      public void exportVerificationResults(int keyIndex, int keySize, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws IOException
      Exports the verification results to a CSV file using the SignatureModel's export function. This method initiates a task to handle the export process asynchronously.
      Overrides:
      exportVerificationResults in class BenchmarkingContext
      Parameters:
      keyIndex - The index of the verification key.
      keySize - The length of the key/key size for which verification results are exported.
      primaryStage - The primary stage for the UI (JavaFX Stage).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file writing.

    • getSignatureResultsLabel

      public String getSignatureResultsLabel(boolean isComparisonMode)
      Overrides the method from the base class to provide a specific label for the signature verification operation results. Utilises the base method to construct the label based on the comparison mode status and sets the operation text to "Verification".
      Specified by:
      getSignatureResultsLabel in class SignatureBaseContext
      Parameters:
      isComparisonMode - Indicates whether the operations were conducted in comparison mode.
      Returns:
      A descriptive label for the signature verification operation results.
